spells.description: Use: Receive cryptic instructions from somewhere in the Twisting Nether to reveal your next task. It's probably nothing, so complete it to gain 14,522 Agility for 15 sec.  (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Use: Call in a ravenous ally and ride off into the sunset (or 15 yds, whichever is closest), inflicting 1.3 million Fire damage split between all enemies you ride through. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Taking damage greater than 25% of your health grants you 2,602 Avoidance and increases healing taken by 10% for 10 sec. This effect may only occur every 90 sec.

Falling damage reduced.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
